## Utils.getLocalModulePath() method

Gets the `local module`<!-- -->'s path from the `local module` name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLocalModulePath(lmn: string): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lmn | string | <code>local module</code> name |

<b>Returns:</b>
